This method scrapes and extracts the data from the .map file into a hashmap of countries and continents.

This method initializes JavaFX stage elements.

This method checks whether the user has selected correct cards to exchange.
isFortificationPossible(Player) - Static method in class utilities.Utilities
This method is used to check if the player can perform fortification or not.

This method is used to identify if number of armies that the player has entered for the reinforcement or fortification phase is validor not
